graph_title: 인구 10만 명당 안전하지 않은 물과 하수처리, 부족한 위생시설로 인한 사망률
indicator_name: 안전하지 않은 물과 하수처리, 부족한 위생시설로 인한 사망률
target_name: 2030년까지 유해화학물질, 대기오염, 수질오염, 토양오염으로 인한 사망 및 질병건수를 상당 수준으로 감소

en.target_name: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination
en.computation_definitions:
National data (Type1)
This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators.
Download the national metadata file for more information.
en.indicator_name: Mortality rate attributed to unsafe water, unsafe sanitation and lack of hygiene (exposure to unsafe Water, Sanitation and Hygiene for All (WASH) services)
en.indicator_definition: Deaths per 100,000 population attributed to intestinal infectious disease(A00, A01-A08, A09), intestinal nematode infection(B76-B77), and malnutrition(E40-E46)
en.computation_calculations: Compiling data from death reports filed with city, district, and municipal offices, baby and fetal death reports from crematories, and data from the ｢Complementary Survey on Causes of Death｣ of medical institutions
en.global_indicator_name: Mortality rate attributed to unsafe water, unsafe sanitation and lack of hygiene (exposure to unsafe Water, Sanitation and Hygiene for All (WASH) services)
en.graph_title: Mortality rate attributed to unsafe water, unsafe sanitation and lack of hygiene
en.title: Untitled
